describe.zh_CN: 由魔力构成的碎片，可以合成带有魔力的物品，想必研究它的人会有很多。\n它的获取方式有很多种，不过最快的可能是从其他人手里购买，这样的话...可以去村庄看看？
describe.en_US: Fragment made of Magic which can craft item with magic. I think there must be many people who study it. There are many ways to obtain it, but the fastest way may be to buy it from others. In that case... why not go to the village and have a look?
